name: BULLETS HELL (Create your own game)
description:
Create your own game:

Try this demo and imagine that you can replace all the sprites by yours!

More details on Kickstarter : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/783475372/bullets-hell

------------------

Amy is the best soldier of America! 

She have to rescue the prisonners of war and to defeat the mechavietcongs of the NeoVietnam Empire!

BulletsHell is a "run and gun" with retro 2D graphics presented in a rigorously-period 8/16 bits style similar to Turbografx-16/PC-Engine.

Playable using the keyboard or a controller, like you prefer.

Many weapons to grab: homing missiles,  big laser wave, rotating shield...

A game forbidden to the youngest and to all those who have not known this golden age of the Turbografx-16/PC-Engine!

(because you might be very disappointed by the graphics and the difficulty compared to recent video games and you will probably not appreciate it...)

Musics:

Beauty Flow by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5025-beauty-flow

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Werq by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4616-werq

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
